作为16年预购老玩家，当时玩了两年的守望，现在回头来玩2真觉得好扯淡，这不还是1有区别吗？当初画的饼pve质量不知如何不知是否值这个价钱，但是对于已经烂透的暴雪来说，只要能挣钱难看也无所谓。目前于我而言体验最差的点在于，不玩够场次不能打字交流？？神经病，一个团队游戏不让交流队友各打各的，至于其他毛病懒得说了，个人觉得纯纯自己搞烂了守望，对于老玩家毫无新意，无非是免费吃到了七年前的剩饭而已，不过也能预见暴雪还是能从这游戏里捞取一些的，最后，作为一个玩了一二十年魔兽游戏的我来说，暴雪好死！自己作的

哦，亲爱的，请允许我用最恶毒的语言来诅咒暴雪，他用他那卑鄙小人的目光看待中国玩家，他一边数着中国玩家贡献的钱钱，一边还要歧视中国玩家。这种真正的种族主义者应该下地狱，而现在我的上帝啊，在关停了中国服之后竟然又恬不知耻的上线steam企图再次敛财。暴雪你个司马东西，就好像那个下水道里的蛆虫，你以为你还是当年的那个老大哥吗，就是他么司马。
可能会有人觉得在不考虑暴雪的情况下，守望是好游戏，但你还不明白吗？游戏也是有国界的，中国玩家为什么被人看不起，就是我们这种自己总为别人考虑，总是以德报怨，总是热脸贴他们的冷屁股。中国人要挺直腰板，中国人要站起来，为什么要跪着玩游戏。去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，去你妈的司马暴雪，

我在2016年10月开始玩守望先锋，六年来它一直是我最喜欢的FPS游戏没有之一，之后守望先锋2出现了，当我看到守望先锋2的宣传片时，我哭了，真的一点不夸张，守望先锋带给我的感动是真实的，我依然记得温斯顿对玩家们说的那振奋人心的演讲；我依然记得源氏和半藏兄弟间的爱恨情仇；我依然记得为死去同伴而战的坚强小美；我依然记得堡垒和妮妮深厚的友情...路霸狂鼠逗比二人组、性感妩媚的百合、救人水火的天使、勇猛无畏的大锤还有漓江塔的宏宇，以及曾经和我一起玩的朋友们，每当看到听到“守望先锋”四个字，这些记忆都在脑中一一闪现，直到守望先锋2上线，一切都结束了，他们都曾是我的英雄，而你，暴雪，你亲手毁了他们，你辜负了玩家的信任，守望先锋曾是一款优秀的游戏，但它不应该像现在这样，眼睛只盯着玩家钱包里的余额，让你就想对它说一句“NO！去你ma的！”，你们真是太他ma让人失望了。


Alihendra：“You one of those heroes, an't you?”
Soldier76：“Not anymore.”

I started playing OverWatch in October 2016, which has been my favorite FPS games for six years. Later, OverWatch 2 appeared. When I saw the promotional video of OverWatch 2, I cried, it's not an exaggeration. The touch that OverWatch brought me was real, and I still remember Winston's inspiring speech to the players; I still remember the love and hate between Genji and the Hanzo brothers; I still remember the strong Mei who fought for her deceased companions; I still remember the deep friendship between the Bastion and Nini ，Roadhog and Junkrat two carzy, the sexy and charming Widowmaker, Mercy saves people from dangers, the fearless Reinharot, and the Hongyu of the Lijiang Tower, as well as the friends I used to play with, whenever I saw and heard the two words "OverWatch", these memories flashed in my mind one by one. Until OverWatch 2 was launched, everything was over. They were all my heroes. But you, Blizzard, you personally destroyed them,You have betrayed the trust of the players. OverWatch used to be an excellent game, but it shouldn't be like this now, just staring at the balance in the player's wallet, making you want to say “NO! F___ You!”to it.You guys are so f___ing disappointing.
非常不建议玩这款游戏, 首先他是暴雪的 其次 他是暴雪的  我战网端国际服 开加速器被封号 之后 我已经彻底放弃了这个游戏, 之所以下回来 主要是给个差评 还有 国服别回归 千万被回归 这个世界不需要守望先锋
x
你说得对，但是《Overwatch》是一款由Blizzard Entertainment, Inc.自研的第一人称射击游戏，暴雪的每位木琴各具特色，玩家阵容不断扩充，战斗紧张刺激，地图遍及全球殡仪馆。可以与好友组队投入惊心动魄的5v5团战，或与全新的强大敌对势力：Motherless的暴雪的殊死搏斗。

Отойдя от эмоций после попыток привязать Battle.Net к Steam, я перепишу отзыв (Если вы удалили со смартфона Battle.Net, предварительно не открепив аутентификатор, то вы никак не зайдёте :) )
Первое, про что стоит сказать - убитый потенциал PvP. Всё началось с ввода 2-2-2 (затем и 2-2-1), а сейчас - убранным режимом "Захват точек", реворком нескольких персонажей (как по мне, нынешний Кулак Смерти более теперь похож на Грушу-Для-Битья) и добавлением персонажей-самоповторов.
Про Баттл Пасс говорить не буду - сами виноваты, что мы, игроки, хотели избавиться от лутбоксов. Смешнее только то, что нельзя отдельно купить PvE миссии от Боевого Пропуска (ради которых Overwatch 2 и затевался, лол).
Вишенка на торте - лор ради лора, чтобы навязать либеральную шелупонь, которая уже бесит самих людей либеральных взглядов.
Не претендую на то, что мой обзор хоть кто-то прочитает. Мне лишь обидно за то, во что игра превратилась и сколько сил я потратил на неё в своё время. И во мне до сих пор горит огонёк надежды, что эта игра вернёт к себе былую популярность.

TLDR: The company does not value you as a player and the game does not value any of your time. We live in a world where games provide incentives to spend time on a game, providing events, content and rewards that are obtainable. Overwatch2 does everything in its power to oppose that by making the player basically pay for everything within the game. This game is not worth pursuing anymore unfortunately, nor is it worth supporting them in any way shape or form. It is truly a disappointment as the game itself had insane potential and yet they basically threw it all in the trash and set it on fire.

I used to love this game. Overwatch 1 was one of the best multiplayer experiences I had playing a game of it's kind (basically a shooter but with Heroes rather than weapons that change around, each with their unique ability).
Despite its faults, it was still a great game and I had accrued about 800 hours before OW2 released.

Now the problem comes from how HORRIBLE the "Sequel" was handled. The players were lied to over and over and over again about so many things, but nothing was as bad as the fact that the MAIN POINT OF CREATING A SEQUEL, literally the main reason they allegedly decided to create a sequel, was cancelled. Sure you might get some bits and pieces, but that was already part of the first game (as part of an event called Archives. AND IT WAS FREE).

This gameplay now remains enjoyable, however, due to all the money grabbing, the terrible choices and many other concerns (such as re-releasing old functionalities (that were removed for no reason) and pretending it's new; or the matchmaking which has never been more broken, an excessive majority of the matches you'll play will be complete stomps (where one team absolutely destroys the other, making it unenjoyable)) makes this a game that in my opinion should be avoided.

Just as an idea skins that before used to be obtainable by either lootboxes (either paid or obtained (you were able to actually obtain a lot of stuff previous in OW1))... now on average cost 20 dollars/euros/pounds, which is absolutely ridiculous. The battle pass does not offer premium currency. And if I recall correctly one needs to do all the weekly/daily? missions for almost a year to be able to purchase 1 single skin.

Companies should suffer from terrible choices and should learn that gameplay and quality is important and should not be abandoned (at least not to the level they did), which is why I highly advise against playing it no matter how fun the gameplay may appear. The longer companies get away with stuff like this the worse it's going to get, up to a point there will be no going back.

《诗经·彼阳》
彼阳若至，初升东曦。
绯雾飒蔽，似幕绡绸。
彼阳篝碧，雾霂涧滁。
赤石冬溪，似玛瑙潭。
彼阳晚意，暖梦似乐。
寐游浮沐，若雉飞舞。​ ​​​

[h1] Misleading title and advertising [/h1]

the only reason this title exists it to monetize overwatch without blizzard getting into legal trouble

i'd say the mainline feature of this game is FOMO, the game has battle passes now and the rewards are much like this game, a steaming pile of shit, and even if you complete the pass you won't get enough premium currency back from it to get the next upcoming pass, smart move by blizzard, you'll always feel the need to spend money

the free currency you could get from role queue from the first game is also behind the battle pass now,
pve is somewhat here but it's behind time limited events

the only upside of this game is the change from 6v6 to 5v5, meaning the chances of getting a seizure induced coma from all the effects on your screen are somewhat reduced

due to the game's f2p nature you can't really expect anything else other than new skins being introduced, and in that aspect the only ones really winning here are coomers, cause the porn can let you enjoy them for free and on other perspectives other than first person

Bought the game on release and actually enjoyed it. Took a break for a year and came back, enjoyed it some more. OVERWATCH 2 GUYS!!!!! this is where I started hating the game. It's apperant its a giant cash grab. Can't wait to see TF2 outlive this used to be beloved game again. 3rd time champs!
